info.title: ClearBank Financial Institutions API
info.description: ClearBank API endpoints for creating and managing accounts and transactions.

post.summary: This endpoint is used to create a cash ISA.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, obtained from the ClearBank Portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestBody.description: The information required to create a cash ISA.

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.
A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

get.summary: Gets a summary of all of the transactions from the institution.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: This parameter controls the number of transactions returned in the response. There is a limit of 1000 per request. A request with over 1000 will result in a bad request. Default if not specified: 50.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: The start date time (when supplied) filters the result set to include transactions where the transaction time is either equal or greater than the value specified.

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: The end date time (when supplied) filters the result set to include transactions where the transaction time is either equal or less than the value specified.

parameters.name: paymentMethodType
parameters.description: The payment method type filters the results to include that payment method type.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, retrieved from the web portal.

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

delete.summary: Disables the virtual account that belongs to the given account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the real account. This can be retrieved from GET /v3/Accounts.

parameters.name: virtualAccountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the virtual account. This can be retrieved from GET /v2/Accounts/{accountId}/Virtual.

type.description: A URI reference RFC3986 that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see RFC7231, Section 3.4)

status.description: The HTTP status code (RFC7231, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

errors.description: Human-readable validation errors specific to this occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see RFC7231, Section 3.4)

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

errors.description: Human-readable validation errors specific to this occurrence of the problem.

get.summary: Lists all of the virtual accounts belonging to an institution.
get.description: All virtual accounts are returned including those which have been disabled. A status field is available.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size to control returned results into manageable sets. Default if not supplied: 50.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, retrieved from the web portal.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see RFC7231, Section 3.4)

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.
A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account.

sortCode.description: The sort code that the account should be created under.

productId.description: The product identifier of the account. It is used to determine the behaviour of the account.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer that holds the account.

applicationDate.description: The date the cash ISA application got created.

acceptanceDate.description: The date the cash ISA application got accepted.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create a cash ISA request.
Information representing the cash ISA and associated hypermedia links.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the account.

productId.description: The product identifier of the account. It is used to determine the behaviour of the account.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer that holds the account.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account.

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time the account got created.

applicationDate.description: The date the cash ISA application got created.

acceptanceDate.description: The date the cash ISA application got accepted.

cashIsaProductType.description: The ISA product type. Supported values are 'Fixed', 'Flex'.

cancellationGracePeriod.description: The number of days a customer has to cancel their ISA without it counting as an active ISA for the tax year.

remainingSubscriptionAllowance.description: The remaining amount a customer can pay into their ISA for the tax year.

cashIsaStatus.description: The ISA status. Supported values are 'Inactive', 'Active', 'Cancelled', 'Closed', 'TransferredOut'.

customerEligibilityStatus.description: The ISA customer eligibility status. Supported values are 'Eligible', 'Ineligible'.

customerEligibilityStatusReason.description: The ISA customer eligibility status reason. Supported values are 'CustomerResidencyStatusChanged', 'CustomerResidencyStatusChanged', 'CustomerHasActiveIsa' or empty

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the cash ISA.

templated.description: Specifies "true" if href is a URI template, i.e. with parameters. Otherwise, this property is absent or set to false.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: A single hypermedia link.

cancellationRequestDate.description: The date the cash ISA cancellation was requested.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create a cash ISA cancellation request.
Information representing the cash ISA cancellation request and associated hypermedia links.

cancellationRequestDate.description: The date cancellation of the account was requested.

isCancellationRequestedWithinGracePeriod.description: Identifies if the cancellation request date was within the grace period.

cancellationGracePeriod.description: The cancellation grace period for the account in days.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the account closure request.

transferOutRequestDate.description: The date the cash ISA transfer out was requested.

transferOutEffectiveDate.description: The date the cash ISA transfer out should be in effect requested.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create a cash ISA transfer out request.
Information representing the cash ISA transfer out response and associated hypermedia links.

cashIsaStatus.description: The status of the cash ISA.

transferOutStatus.description: The status of the cash ISA transfer out. Supported values are 'InProgress'.

transferOutRequestDate.description: The date the cash ISA transfer out was requested.

transferOutEffectiveDate.description: The date the cash ISA transfer out should be in effect requested.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the cash ISA transfer out response.
Information that is used to create a cash ISA transfer out rejected request.
Information representing the cash ISA rejected transfer out response and associated hypermedia links.

transferOutStatus.description: The Status of the Transfer Out.

transferOutRejectionDate.description: The date the Transfer out was rejected.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the account rejected transfer out request.

status.description: Current status of the account. Valid options include Not Provided, Enabled, Closed, Suspended.

statusReason.description: Reason that the account is Closed or Suspended.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account.

legalOwnerType.description: Nature of funds held in the account. Valid options include: Personal, Business.

relationshipType.description: Operating nature of the account. Valid options include Single, Joint. If legalOwnerType is Business, then the relationshipType cannot be Joint.

minimumBalance.description: The minimum allowable balance of the account (example: -£1000). Note that you must send a negative number to create an overdraft. This field can only be used if your organisation is an embedded banking client with an overdraft agreement in place; otherwise the request will be rejected.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information required for a current account amendment.

identifier.description: The identifier of the nominated account.

identifierKind.description: The identifier kind of the nominated account. Supported values are 'IBAN', 'BBAN' and 'SCAN'.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the nominated account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: The information required to set a nominated account.
The nominated account details and associated hypermedia links.

identifier.description: The identifier of the nominated account.

identifierKind.description: The identifier kind of the nominated account. Supported values are 'IBAN', 'BBAN' and 'SCAN'.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the nominated account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: The nominated account details.

closureReason.description: Reason for the account closure request. Valid options include AccountHolderBankrupt, AccountHolderDeceased, AccountSwitched, CompanyNoLongerTrading, DissatisfiedCustomer, DuplicateSoleTraderAccount, FinancialCrime, FraudFirstParty, FraudThirdParty, Other.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create an account closure request.
Information representing the account closure request and associated hypermedia links.

closureReason.description: Reason for the account closure request.

closureStatus.description: State of the account closure request.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the account closure request.
Information representing the account closure response and associated hypermedia links.

closureStatus.description: State of the account closure request.

closureFailureReasons.description: A collection of reasons the account closure failed.

accountModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time of the latest modification on the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the account closure response.

transactions.description: A collection of the transactions against the specified account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Represents one or more transactions against the specified institution and associated hypermedia links.

transactionId.description: The unique identifier for this transaction.

status.description: The current status of the transaction.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Represents information regarding a transaction.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account.

sortCode.description: The sort code that the account should be created under.

productId.description: The product identifier of the account. It is used to determine the behaviour of the account.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer that holds the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create a cash ISA request.
Information representing the Saving Account and associated hypermedia links.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the account.

productId.description: The product identifier of the account. It is used to determine the behaviour of the account.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer that holds the account.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account.

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time the account got created.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the Saving Account.

ownerName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the virtual account.

legalOwnerType.description: Nature of funds held in the virtual account. Valid options include: Personal, Business.

relationshipType.description: Operating nature of the virtual account. Valid options include Single, Joint. If legalOwnerType is Business, then the relationshipType cannot be Joint.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Represents the data for updating a virtual account.

accounts.description: A collection of all accounts belonging to the institution associated with the API token.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Represents one or more accounts and associated hypermedia links.

id.description: The unique identifier for the virtual account.

name.description: The friendly name of the virtual account.

type.description: Specifies the type of the virtual account.

status.description: Specifies the status of the virtual account.

currency.description: Currencies used for the virtual account.

iban.description: The IBAN identifier associated with the account.

bban.description: The BBAN identifier associated with the account.

upic.description: The Universal Payment Identification Code (UPIC) associated with the account.

cuid.description: The CHIPS Universal Identifier associated with the account.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Represents a summary of a given virtual account.
